fileRelatedRequirements.description: Local Employer name as customer on supplier invoice
fileRelatedRequirements.rule: Must show Global People IT-Services GmbH as customer

fileRelatedRequirements.description: Local Employer address as customer on supplier invoice
fileRelatedRequirements.rule: Must show Kärntner Ring 12, A-1010 Vienna, Austria

fileRelatedRequirements.description: Local Employer VAT number as customer on supplier invoice
Exception for flights/bookings where Local Employer name not possible
fileRelatedRequirements.rule: Worker's name acceptable when Local Employer name not possible, not end client
Local currency with FX rate calculation
Must be clearly stated on receipt
Must be actual tax receipts or invoices, not booking confirmations
Online copies sufficient, hard copy not required
Any personal information not required for reimbursement must be removed
Submit separate report for each trip
Must use Travel Expense Report Template Austria EUR.xlsx
Map with relevant route (Google Maps sufficient)
Record of kilometers traveled must be submitted
Parking tickets should be included within the mileage payment

complianceAndPolicies.description: General business expenses for job completion
complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Usually tax exempt, grossed up if not tax free
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - you must provide sufficient proof like tax receipts or invoices

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Follow specific tax allowances and rules
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - you must follow specific tax allowances found at government website
Receipt alone is not enough - you must get approval from your direct manager

complianceAndPolicies.description: Private vehicles, motorbikes, bicycles for work
complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Maximum €0.42 per km, capped at €12,600 annually
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt is not applicable - you must provide map with route (Google Maps sufficient), record of kilometers, car details, and use travel template

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Should be included within mileage payment, taxed if paid separately
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - parking tickets should be included within mileage payment

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Maximum €30 per day (€2.50/hour for 3-12 hours), capped at €26.40 mentioned in document
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - you must use travel report template and cannot mix per diem with actual expenses

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Tax-free per diem covers meals, reduced by 50% if meals provided
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt is enough - per diem method covers meals

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Paid separately with proper invoice/receipt or €17
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - provide proper invoice/receipt or accept €17 flat rate

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Per diem rates set by government for each destination
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - you must use travel report template and cannot mix per diem with actual expenses

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Tax-free based on government limits per destination, can be increased with receipts
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - for amounts above government rate, you must submit receipts

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: If lunch and dinner provided, per diem reduced by two-thirds
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt is enough - automatic reduction applies

complianceAndPolicies.description: Non-per diem expenses for international travel
complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Expenses outside per diem paid against receipts
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Receipt alone is not enough - you must provide receipts for expenses outside per diem

complianceAndPolicies.grossUpRule: Cannot mix per diem method with actual expenses
complianceAndPolicies.additionalInfoDescription: Cannot mix per diem method with actual expenses
